channel.title: Game UI Design
channel.description:
I'm in need of graphics for a UI-system which will be used for my RPG-engine (http://code.google.com/p/jquest2d/) sample game. The goal would be to achieve something similar to that of classic SNES-titles such as Chrono Trigger.
I will need a "progress-bar" design and various other components.
Style: Something gritty, preferrably stone-ish with a nice border (refer to screenshots).
Here are some examples:
[img]http://zerolightseeds.files.wordpress.com/2009/03/chronotriggerinside.png?w=369&h=306[/img] [img]http://everydaygamers.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/08/Chrono-Trigger-2.jpg[/img] [img]http://everygame.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/chronotrigger21.jpg[/img]
The graphics created will be licensed under Creative Commons 3.0.

item.title: Game UI Design
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

I said something like:

I’m too lazy to refine them now so if anyone else wants to expand on them and put some borders and change the colours etc…

Read full topic
